component.name: [AusfarmPasture.name]Model
component.initdata: <initsection> <init name="published_events" array="T"> </init> <init name="driver_connections" array="T"> </init> <init name="param_file" kind="string"> <val></val> </init> <init name="species" kind="string"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.species]</val> </init> [if [AusfarmPasture.Nutrients] <> [AusfarmPasture.Nutrients]] <init name="nutrients" kind="string"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.nutrients]</val> </init> <init name="fertility" kind="double"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.fertility]</val> </init> <init name="layers" kind="double" array="T" unit="mm"> </init> <init name="max_rtdep" kind="double" unit="mm"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.max_rtdep]</val> </init> <init name="lagged_day_t" kind="double" unit="oC"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.lagged_day_t]</val> </init> <init name="phenology" kind="double"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.phenology]</val> </init> <init name="flower_len" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.flower_len]</val> </init> <init name="flower_time" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.flower_time]</val> </init> <init name="senc_index" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.senc_index]</val> </init> <init name="dorm_index" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.dorm_index]</val> </init> <init name="dorm_t" kind="double" unit="oC"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.dorm_t]</val> </init> <init name="extinct_coeff" kind="double" array="T"> <val>0.0</val> <val>0.5</val> <val>0.0</val> </init> <init name="green" array="T"> [foreach AusfarmPasture.AusfarmPastureGreen as Green] <element> <field name="status" kind="string"> <val>[Green.status]</val> </field> <field name="herbage" array="T"> [foreach Green.AusfarmPastureGreenHerbage as Herbage] <element> <field name="dmd" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.dmd]</val> </field> <field name="weight" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Herbage.weight]</val> </field> <field name="n_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.n_conc]</val> </field> <field name="p_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.p_conc]</val> </field> <field name="s_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.s_conc]</val> </field> <field name="spec_area" kind="double" array="T" unit="cm^2/g"> <val>[Herbage.spec_area]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </field> <field name="root_wt" array="T"> [foreach Green.AusfarmPastureGreenHerbage as Herbage] <element kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Herbage.root_wt]</val> </element> [endfor] </field> <field name="rt_dep" kind="double" unit="mm"> <val>[Green.rt_dep]</val> </field> <field name="estab_index" kind="double"> <val>[Green.estab_index]</val> </field> <field name="stress_index" kind="double"> <val>[Green.stress_index]</val> </field> <field name="stem_reloc" kind="double" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Green.stem_reloc]</val> </field> <field name="frosts" kind="integer4"> <val>[Green.frosts]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </init> <init name="dry" array="T"> [foreach AusfarmPasture.AusfarmPastureDry as Dry] <element> <field name="status" kind="string"> <val>[Dry.status]</val> </field> <field name="herbage" array="T"> [foreach Dry.AusfarmPastureDryHerbage as Herbage] <element> <field name="dmd" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.dmd]</val> </field> <field name="weight" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Herbage.weight]</val> </field> <field name="n_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.n_conc]</val> </field> <field name="p_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.p_conc]</val> </field> <field name="s_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.s_conc]</val> </field> <field name="spec_area" kind="double" array="T" unit="cm^2/g"> <val>[Herbage.spec_area]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </field> </element> [endfor] </init> [foreach AusfarmPasture.AusfarmPastureSeeds as Seeds] <init name="seeds"> <field name="soft_unripe" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Seeds.soft_unripe]</val> </field> <field name="soft_ripe" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Seeds.soft_ripe]</val> </field> <field name="hard_unripe" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Seeds.hard_unripe]</val> </field> <field name="hard_ripe" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Seeds.hard_ripe]</val> </field> </init> [endfor] <init name="seed_dorm_time" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.seed_dorm_time]</val> </init> <init name="germ_index" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.germ_index]</val> </init> <init name="kl" kind="double" unit="d^-1"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.kl]</val> </init> <init name="ll" kind="double" unit="mm/mm"> <val>[AusfarmPasture.ll]</val> </init> [endif] </initsection>
